reasoning: In situ lobular carcinoma (ILBC) represents 10-20% of breast cancers globally. Based on GLOBOCAN 2005 breast cancer incidence (~40-45 per 100k women) and estimated 15% ILBC proportion = ~6-7 per 100k women.
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 (IARC), with proportion estimates from international breast pathology literature
